price: Pero luego [las generaciones que vinieron después] se dividieron, aunque todos regresarán ante Mí.
arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيۡنَا رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum kullun ilaynā rājiʿūna
